players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we work together to identify and eliminate them."
You: "I agree with Charlie. We need to stay vigilant and work together to identify the mafia among us. Let's try to gather as much information as we can during this discussion round."

You: "I think it's important that we consider the possibility of a false accusation. We don't want to wrongly accuse an innocent player and cause unnecessary tension in the game. Let's try to gather as much information as possible before making any assumptions."
Diana: "Bob was a good guy, he didn't deserve to die. I'm not saying who killed him but I think we should focus on finding the real mafia among us. We can't just accuse people randomly."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
